Package org.graffiti.plugins.ios.exporters.graphviz

Class DOTSerializer

java.lang.Object
org.graffiti.plugin.io.AbstractOutputSerializer
org.graffiti.plugins.ios.exporters.graphviz.DOTSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
OutputSerializer, Serializer
public class DOTSerializer
extends AbstractOutputSerializer
A very very simple writer for a graph in the dot format for Graphviz. The only exported attribute are labels.
Version:
$Revision: 1.9 $ $Date: 2010/12/22 13:06:28 $
